title: Punto
content:
This is Punto, one of the my first fonts. I would like to know your opinion about it, what is good, what i should change.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414053410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/punto_5501.jpg)
author: mbtype

comments.content:
Hi José,

With this image, it's not clear whether the jagged edges are part of your design or just becasue of a low-res jpeg!

You may want to post a different sample image where one can view the details better. It may also be an idea to use a PDF.
Sorry my ignorance, but how can i insert a pdf? On insert image only let me insert jpg. gif. & png.....

If it's a PDF, I think you'd need to upload it on to your server and post a link.

Jpeg, gif etc. could also do the job provided the samples are slightly larger.

Good luck!
I update the image. I think now is better.

It's quite interesting :)

Can you give some background on how you came upon this design, and also perhaps the applications that you designed it for?

Btw have you seen [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414053410/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Pixella/mudTyper+Weights)?

A, V, v, w, y are really too wide.

The b is aesthetically strange, but it probably helps legibility.  
You might want to try to find a way to make the descender of the g not so big.

The rest of the design is nice and solid, though I think one pixel is missing from the diagonal of the M, and the serif on the bottom of the h may be closing it too much.

The numerals are my favorite. I like that they have their own height.

Thanks for the feedback.  
I came up with this design, when i see the work of Zuzana Licko with Lo-Res, and some manual works that with the point we construct the letter. From this i came up with Punto.

Hinting is a kind of programing to make a typeface look good on the screen.  
A well hinted typeface should look something like this,

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414053410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stam_5974.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414053410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AA_3752.jpg)

No, it isn't hinted.  
Thanks for the tip

This is the most recent version of Punto. I change b,v,w and i have hinted it.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414053410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/punto%20novo_6057.jpg)
Can you upload an image containing some running text?

Here it is with some running text...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414053410im_/http:/typophile.com/files/text_4291.jpg)
I liked it but your lc 'h' look like 'b' to me. Also one might get confused between the 'c' and 'o'. Also B look like E ( eg. Bar and Ear)
